content: Thank you for this — we can never fully know the hearts and intentions of all the ‘some-bodies’ out there, but what truer depiction of our equal humanity than the experience of death. And what better reminder to seek humility and inner peace; at the end of life that’s all any of us have. As a hospice nurse I sit with all sorts of people, rich or poor or famous or unknown, as they approach the edge of death. Each person is remarkably unique but each person’s death is also remarkably similar.
